avalancheActivity.comment:
The new snow and wind slabs of the last few days can be released in some cases above approximately 2500 m, caution is to be exercised at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack. Mostly the avalanches in these loacations are medium-sized.
Apart from the danger of being buried, restraint should be exercised in view of the danger of avalanches sweeping people along and giving rise to falls.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The more recent wind slabs represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment:
Up to 15 cm of snow, and even more in some localities, has fallen since Friday above approximately 1500 m. In some cases the various wind slabs have bonded poorly with each other and the old snowpack.
At higher altitudes snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind. In all regions below approximately 2500 m thus far only a little snow is lying.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The new snow and wind slabs of the last few days can be released in some cases above approximately 2500 m, caution is to be exercised at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack. In particular along the border with France the avalanche prone locations are a little more prevalent. Mostly the avalanches in these loacations are medium-sized.
Apart from the danger of being buried, restraint should be exercised in view of the danger of avalanches sweeping people along and giving rise to falls.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The more recent wind slabs represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment:
Up to 15 cm of snow, and even more in some localities, has fallen since Friday above approximately 1500 m. In some cases the various wind slabs have bonded poorly with each other and the old snowpack. In some places new snow and wind slabs are lying on a hard crust.
At higher altitudes snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind. In all regions below approximately 2500 m only a little snow is now lying.

avalancheActivity.comment:
Individual avalanche prone locations are to be found above approximately 2500 m, in particular at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack, when entering gullies and bowls for example, in particular along the border with France.
In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the icy crust.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The avalanche prone locations are rare and are easy to recognise.

snowpackStructure.comment:
In all regions only a little snow is now lying. In particular at low and intermediate altitudes from a snow sport perspective, insufficient snow is lying. At high altitudes and in high Alpine regions snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind.
The snowpack is well consolidated. It is not distinctly layered.
